name: If The Hue Fits
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

WS - Move
AD - Rotate
E - Interact
Esc - Close Inventory
Scroll - Change ammo to complementary colour of enemy 
Mouse click - Shoot

STORY

Dave Inche was working in the newest emulsion paint company on the market, Painter-Boja, when a terrible disaster happened, A chemical element tumbled out of their hands and dripped a single drop of arsenic into the brewing paint.

Dave Inche didn't think anything about it until what was once people began to turn into adorable monsters called 'Huemens'.

Dave Inche must work on a solution to solve what has started off as a minor incident.

‘If The Hue Fits' is a dungeon-crawler/zombie apocalypse game. Our main protagonist must use their paintbrush and various paints to cure the town from a virus.
